author: Appreccia D.
text:
I really worry about the rapid rate in which we consume and accept information before it can be critiqued and verified. 

It’s quite alarming the hard opinions we form sometime with misinformation,misreporting and omitted facts.

author: Appreccia D.
text:
really enjoyed the hosts of the Oscars this year. #Reginahall and #WandaSykes were absolutely hilarious! 

I laughed each time they graced the screen.

author: Appreccia D.
text: Y’all mocked #CoryBooker for affirming #KentanjiBrownJackson Y’all are now embarrassed and ashamed #WillSmith defended his wife in real time. It’s protect Black Women until it’s time to protect Black women. It’s never really a right time and way to defend Black women on this app.

author: Appreccia D.
text:
Y’all gotta stop with the “now everyone is going to see us a violent tomorrow.” Hmmm, you do know.. well never mind. 
#WillSmith #Oscars https://t.co/fRUW7sYZJI

Hope you can join us. #Blackvoices #globalaffairs https://t.co/cagH2fM9Rg

author: Appreccia D.
text:
Happy International Women's Day! 

May we lean more into our emotions in business, life and love to become the best version of ourselves. 

May we celebrate the diversity among the Black women wthin our community and not only those we identify with. 

#IWD #IWD2022

text:

p.s. it’s multiple culprits

author: Appreccia D.
text:
I’ve pulled back from speaking these days but I truly enjoy joining @TedWilliamsIII every #MLKDay to highlight the legacy of of our King. 

This year the topic was “King the Radical” Here’s a small clip of me charging folks to become more radical in the pursuit of change. https://t.co/kJfVifAYJh
